website_summaries.verdict: Without sacrificing quality and function, the Hyper MD from Asics is dubbed as the lightest track spike from the Hyper series. It boasts versatility, accommodating various track and field tournaments. This is owed by the running spike to its top-notch componentry. With the Hyper MD 5, users can expect featherlight support and traction on the tracks.
pros: Several reviewers compliment the lightness of the Hyper MD 5
It has an appropriate amount of cushioning, remarked some athletes
A few wearers commend the support provided by the track spike
According to many users,  the running platform is made of high-quality materials
Quite a few laud the versatility of the mid-distance spike
cons: It lacks durability, noted some purchasers
A number of buyers state that the running shoe is too tight

customer_reviews.title: Does not come with spikes or spike tool
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my boyfriend who runs sprints with me. They were the best price online. However, they DO NOT come with the spikes or spike tool. By the time you buy the spike and tool separate and go to a sporting goods store you might as well buy a shoe a tad bit more expensive that comes with all the spikes and tool. I have since purchased New Balance that are ready for use. I wear New Balance and love them.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Great biy
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these shoes. Runs track, does hurdles never have trouble with them.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: A good all around track spike for the newbie 3200 mtr
customer_reviews.text: ASICS Quality...supportive,cusiony,durable .A good all around track spike for the newbie 3200 mtr. runner on the team.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Puncsak

customer_reviews.title: Good quality middle distance spikes
customer_reviews.text: Really good racing spikes. Great fit and quality. Comfortable and light, best for 400m and 800m and even for cross country races as heel provides some support when compared with sprint track spikes. Not enough heel-strike support for training, though.
customer_reviews.author: S. Seyringer

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: My shoes did come with the metal studs and a tool to insert them with- I bought them not expecting those! Very comfortable. I would recommend them to anyone who wants to run on an indoor track.
customer_reviews.author: Kael

customer_reviews.title: Fit is comfort
customer_reviews.text: Not as tight as the other models, therefore more comfortable.....love it
customer_reviews.author: Donovant G.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe/spikes: -)
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe/spikes :-) !!! Light, comfortable, good quality, nice looking. But, they don't come with the spikes or spike tool.
customer_reviews.author: Marian

customer_reviews.title: They're light and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these. I made it to state wearing these for the first time. I ran a 1:59.67. THAT'S A 4 SECOND PR!!!!!!! It might have something to do with my hard work or it could just be the shoes. I don't care I just like them.
customer_reviews.author: the black guy

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good All-around Shoe! Need to be a half inch longer.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Good Middle Distance
customer_reviews.text: I run the 800m in 1:55 I'm a junior in high school and I did it in these spikes, highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Smith

customer_reviews.title: good fit and very light
customer_reviews.text: Very light and great for running mid-distance.. Ok for high jumping but could use better mid-foot traction. Very nice fit.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Sjerven

customer_reviews.title: They're gucc tho
customer_reviews.text: Love them, their super comfy but mot good for concrete though as their meant specifically for track and field
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... up to the torcher the ms 5 are a great mid and short distance shoe the newer shoe the ...
customer_reviews.text: My son uses these shoes and they hold up to the torcher the ms 5 are a great mid and short distance shoe the newer shoe the 6 looks different
customer_reviews.author: robert davis

customer_reviews.title: It is a great deal for me
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are very light. Get it for only $19.95. It is a great deal for me.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Ben

customer_reviews.title: Super Lightweight!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shoe, looks better in person, shoes constructed of a see thru material. This adds to the look and makes the shoe even lighter.
customer_reviews.author: Dgib

customer_reviews.title: Not what expected
customer_reviews.text: They are thin unsubstantial and come w cleats I can't use. Are they golf shoes?
customer_reviews.author: MARBLEMOM57

customer_reviews.title: Runs slightly larger
customer_reviews.text: Bought 8.5M for my son and fits great. Recently bought ASIC Kayano 19 in size 9M. Has not worn them yet appears to in good quality and hopefully they will last the season.
customer_reviews.author: PS

customer_reviews.title: Running shoe is actually a track shoe
customer_reviews.text: The item description did not say that it was a track shoe with removable spike he tried to wear them anyways and they were extremely slippery. Loved the look though!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Parker

customer_reviews.title: shoe only for sprinters - not a casual shoe
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is not meant to be worn as a casual shoe. Its too bad since I really love the external appearance - but its mainly for serious sprinters and track athletes.
customer_reviews.author: conscious79

customer_reviews.title: wonderful product!
customer_reviews.text: Great, lightweight shoe! Fits as expected and looks great on. Very comfortable and a bit more roomy in the toes than other styles.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole McDonough

product_meta.title: ASICS Mens Hyper MD 5-M Hyper Md 5-m
product_meta.description: The lightest shoe in the Hyperï¿½ series family, the HYPERï¿½ MD 5 weighs in at 6.4 ounces with pins making it an ideal shoe for a variety of events including jumps. Using a newly designed super lightweight upper featuring hotmelt TPU construction and monomesh, combined with a Nylon Spike plate and cushioned heel, the Hyperï¿½ MD 5 is the perfect shoe for those that want to fly- either across the track or thru the air.
